name: Dino T-Rex 3D Run
description:
Just enjoy the remake of the popular offline and endless game, that you know from the Google Chrome browser in new 3D dimension!

In the Dino T-Rex 3D Run, you can find cool features like:

- 3D Dino T-Rex
- 3D obstacles
- alternating day and night
- increasing speed
- black and white mode or color mode
- 3D or 2D mode 
- playful music
- funny sounds 
- cool effects during the run
- simple controls
